name: Symphobia
description:
SYMPHOBIA

Team: (Size 4).

Aditya Pavan Gadi – Game Artist/Designer.

Anirudh Muralidar – Game Developer/Programmer.

Manish Kumar - Game Developer/Programmer.

Mohammed Adnan Ahmed – Character Modeller.

Game Concept: 

The game kind of involves all the 4 themes of the Seamedu game jam. The game is a first-person shooter in which the player has a sound wave frequency gun which can produce sound or music that can destroy the aliens. Each alien has a different frequency at which it can be killed.

Story: Aliens have Disguised themselves and infiltrated Earth, but the illusion generators are weak to a certain sound wave….

Expose them and kill them with the help of your music launcher.

Different aliens are weak to different to different waves (based on colour).

 

Objective:

Expose the Aliens and kill them.

  Controls:

+  To Run      To Jump
